label: 灌頂
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Baptisms were among the esoteric rituals performed at the Tōji (Kyōōgokokuji), a great Shingon temple founded early in the ninth century, which survives in altered form at its original site in Minami-ku, Kyoto (p. 511n). [東寺、教王護国寺、真言、南区]
